title: Retro/slightly rustic font id needed please!
content:
Hi all, I am looking to identify this font.  
Looks like a rustic poker font but have very nuveau cross line?  
Thanks for any help!  
rgbdna

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120306211840im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font4_3466.jpg)
author: rgbdna

comments.content: looks like a custom(not sure) but you could try one of [these](http://web.archive.org/web/20120306211840/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontcase/genres/wood_type_decorative)

This looks like the font based on the Wolverine comic book logo. I'm not sure if it's a rip-off font, so I won't post the link.

- Lex
You can find similar at [Letterhead Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20120306211840/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/) although I don't think this is one of theirs.
